summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to fire and explosion hazards; repealing sections 22.600.010, 22.600.020, 22.600.030, 22.604.010, 22.606.010, 22.606.020, 22.606.030, 22.606.040, 22.606.050, 22.606.060, 22.606.070, 22.606.080, 22.606.090, 22.606.100, 22.606.110, 22.606.120 and 22.606.130 of the Seattle Municipal Code and Ordinances 108678, 109765, 109766, 110137, and 110594 and Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance 110548, and adding new sections 22.600.010, 22.600.020, 22.600.030, 22.600.040 and 22.604.010, to adopt the 1982 edition of the Uniform Fire Code, the 1982 edition of the Uniform Fire Code Standards, and amendments thereto, as the Seattle Fire Codes.
